author: Special Correspondent
text:
There will be power shutdown in the following areas due to maintenance work:

February 1 (9 a.m. to 5 p.m.)

Dinamani Nagar, Karisalkulam, Pandian Nagar, IOC Colony, VMW Colony, Sangeeth Nagar, Chokkalinga Nagar, Koodal Nagar, All India Radio, Alanganallur Road, Chellaiah Nagar, Anaiyur, JJ Nagar, Santhi Nagar, Railar Nagar, Fatima College, Meenakshi Nagar, Old Vilangudi, New Vilangudi, Ramamoorthy Nagar, Kovil Pappakudi Junction and Sikkandar Chavadi.

February 2 (9 a.m. to 2 p.m.)

Rajakkalpatti, Maravarpatti, Chatravellalapatti, Valayapatti, Errampatti, Konapatti, Palamedu, Chinnapalamedu, Manickampatti, Senthamangalam, Pondhugampatti, Mettupatti and Usilampatti.
title: Power shutdown
